Class Fleet

java.lang.Object
iscteiul.ista.battleship.Fleet
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFleet
public class Fleet extends Object implements IFleet
Represents a collection of ships (a fleet). Manages adding ships, checking collisions, and retrieving fleet status.

    • getShips

      public List<IShip> getShips()
      Retrieves all ships currently in the fleet.
      Specified by:
      getShips in interface IFleet
      Returns:
      A list of IShip objects.

    • addShip

      public boolean addShip(IShip s)
      Attempts to add a ship to the fleet. The ship is added only if: 1. The fleet is not full. 2. The ship fits inside the board boundaries. 3. The ship does not collide with or get too close to existing ships.
      Specified by:
      addShip in interface IFleet
      Parameters:
      s - The ship to add.
      Returns:
      true if the ship was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • getShipsLike

      public List<IShip> getShipsLike(String category)
      Retrieves a list of ships matching a specific category name.
      Specified by:
      getShipsLike in interface IFleet
      Parameters:
      category - The category name (e.g., "Barca", "Caravela").
      Returns:
      A list of matching ships.

    • getFloatingShips

      public List<IShip> getFloatingShips()
      Retrieves all ships that are still floating (not fully sunk).
      Specified by:
      getFloatingShips in interface IFleet
      Returns:
      A list of ships that are still floating.

    • shipAt

      public IShip shipAt(IPosition pos)
      Finds the ship occupying a specific position on the board.
      Specified by:
      shipAt in interface IFleet
      Parameters:
      pos - The position to query.
      Returns:
      The ship at the given position, or null if the position is empty.

    • isInsideBoard

      private boolean isInsideBoard(IShip s)
      Checks if the ship's coordinates are fully within the board boundaries.
      Parameters:
      s - The ship to check.
      Returns:
      true if the ship is inside the board, false otherwise.

    • colisionRisk

      private boolean colisionRisk(IShip s)
      Checks if the given ship collides with or is placed too close to any existing ship.
      Parameters:
      s - The ship to check for collisions.
      Returns:
      true if there is a collision risk, false if the placement is safe.

    • printStatus

      public void printStatus()
      Prints the full status of the fleet to the console. Includes all ships, floating ships, and ships grouped by category.
      Specified by:
      printStatus in interface IFleet

    • printShipsByCategory

      public void printShipsByCategory(String category)
      Prints all ships of a specific category.
      Parameters:
      category - The category of ships to print.

    • printFloatingShips

      public void printFloatingShips()
      Prints all ships that have not yet been sunk.

    • printAllShips

      void printAllShips()
